transcript:
Customer: Mangal Bhavan Amangal Hari
Halo
Executive: Rathyut ji namaskar.
Customer: Namaskar sir.
Executive: Aditya baat kar raha tha.
Haa
Executive: Nagar India Mart trade office se aapne concern raise kiya tha Abhishek se aur phir abhi ek mail bhi kar diya hai sir.
Customer: Haa.
Executive: Uske regarding connect kiya tha. Sir, is regarding to baat hui thi sir aap to bole the ki abhi use karenge phir do din mein hi kya ho gaya sir?
Customer: Sir nahi karna hai.
Executive: Nahi karna hai? Thik hai main request dal de raha hu but problem jaan sakta hu kaha aaya?
Customer: Problem ki main main khud usko handle nahi kar paunga. Inquiry mein inquiry mein kuch link aa nahi raha hai. Pehle aapki inquiry kam aa rahi hai aur usme main catch up nahi kar pa raha hu. Kyuki main akela banda hu jo business chalane wala ye.
Executive: Sir to ye cheez to aapko pehle dekhna chahiye tha na sir aap service liye the. Aapko sari cheeze batai gayi hongi. Agar aapko isme problem aa rahi hai use karne mein manpower ki issue aa rahi hai.
Customer: Are sir, main bhi jaanta hu aap badi company se ho. Sir main aapse ladne mein hi.
Executive: Company koi badi chhoti nahi hoti hai. Main ek normal normal generally puch raha hu aapse ye nahi keh raha hu ki aapki galti hai to.
Customer: Sir main aapse request karta hu please kindly cancel karna hai samjhaiye mat.
Executive: Haa cancel karenge cancel kar do uske liye main process request dal de raha hu abhi. Abhishek ne bhi dala tha morning mein aisa nahi hai ki.
Customer: Aur aur aur aur GST bhi abhi maine pay nahi kiya hai aur next month mein abhi GST filing hoga 11 tarikh ek se 11 tak thik hai. To to usme usme GST bhi mat dalna.
Executive: Nahi main account team ko bata dunga na. Wo account team aapse connect karke aapko bata degi aisa nahi hai. Main aaj request dal de raha hu aap ye maan lijiye ki isme saat se 10 din ka time lagega on an average.
Customer: Sir to ye bill.
Executive: Kya?
Customer: Sir aapse package lene mein to aadha ghanta ka der nahi lagta hai. Main ye jaan sakta hu.
Executive: Package lene mein to sir package lene mein do minute lagta hai proposal approve kijiyega payment kijiyega uske baad uski verification hoti hai production ka kaam hota hai catalog chalu hone mein bhi char se paanch din lagte hai. Char se paanch din lagte hai.
Customer: Itna hi hota hai?
Executive: Nahi sir ek din mein aapne chalu kar diya tha mera.
Customer: Do din mein.
Executive: To aap ho sakta hai haa ho sakta hai ki wo rate case mein aapne request dala hoga aapne bola hoga to unhone jaldi jaldi kar diya. Nahi to agar average jo production time hota hai na sir total live karne ka bhi wo char se paanch din hota hai aur refund mein bhi aisa kya hai ye nahi ki aapne call karke bol diya refund de do to hum turant aapko Google Pay ya Phone Pay kar denge. Waisa nahi hota hai process hota hai sir. Main yaha se request forward kar raha hu.
Customer: Sir process hota hai lekin lekin main abhi mail bhi kar deta hu aap GST mat pay karna government ko thik hai.
Executive: Aa gaya. Mail aapka aa gaya hai sir wo jo process hai uske according.
Customer: Haa phir bhi phir bhi ek main GST wala bhi GST wala bhi karunga aur usme bhi attach karunga main ki GST wala GST government ko mat pay karna kyuki abhi main service nahi lena chahta 10 din kya wo pure saal ka aap GST pay kar doge to wo mere upar bhi ho jayega uska mujhe refund nahi milega GST ka thik hai.
Executive: Uska aapko jo wapas jayega bhi na amount wo with GST jata hai jaise aapne 37660 diya tha na to usme GST ka cut aisa nahi ki aapko 32 diya jayega paise wapas karke wo GST ke sath jata hai. 37 ye maan lijiye ki 35 36 jo bhi amount hogi 34 GST ke sath aapko wapas jayegi aisa nahi hai ki GST ke paise koi kat lega aapse ya kha jayega. Waisa nahi hai sir.
Customer: Aapka naam kya hai sir?
Executive: Aditya sir parso aapse baat hui thi.
Customer: Haa haa thik hai sir.
Executive: Senior. Haa.
Customer: Okay. Maine hi aapko GST ke sath aana chahiye sir kyuki ye pure saal ka GST lag raha hai thik hai maine maine apne GST portal mein ye invoice jo aapka abhi dala hua hai mujhe dikh raha hai thik hai wo maine pending mein dal diya hai abhi accept nahi kiya hai maine.
Executive: Sir wo to account check karwana hoga na wo to unke upar hai wo paisa jo aapka jayega wo GST ke sath jayega lekin unhone file kiya hai ya nahi uske regarding main koi update nahi de sakta. Main request dal de raha hu.
Customer: Wo main aapko main aapko batata hu sir wo ek ek tarikh se lekar 11 tarikh tak file file karte hai kar sakte hai thik hai invoice ka next month.
Executive: Wo cheez sahi hai is month ka.
Customer: Haa next month file kar sakte hai us usko mere or se mail kar dijiyega aur main bhi abhi mail kar deta hu aap sabko ki bhai ye GST GST mein.
Executive: Haa hamare paas aa gaya sir hamare paas already aa gaya aapka mail complete wo open ho chuka hai.
Customer: To jo maine aapko amount diya hai wo GST ke sath diya hai sir.
Executive: Haa maine aapko already diya tha.
Customer: Haa sir pehle meri baat sun lijiye sir.
Executive: Sir complaint ki jarurat nahi hai ji boliye boliye.
Customer: Main ye baat kar raha hu ki maine jo aapko amount diya wo GST ke sath diya hai sir thik hai.
Executive: Haa.
Customer: Haa us amount mein abhi GST laga hua hai wo abhi aapne government ko pay nahi kiya hai right?
Executive: Pay ho chuka hai ya nahi pay hua hai uski knowledge mujhe nahi hai.
Customer: Haa haa sir right right lekin main aapko bata deta hu mere.
Executive: Hota hai.
Customer: Haa mera mere ko 100% knowledge hai isliye main bata raha hu sir wo abhi pay nahi hua hoga wo pay karne ka time hota hai aapka 14 14 se.
Executive: Wo time hota hai sahi hai wo time hota hai.
Executive: Sahi hai lekin yaha pe sir daily ke hazaro lakho transaction hote hai.
Customer: Haa.
Executive: Agar wo ho gaya hoga to uski information nahi di ja sakti.
Customer: Phir bhi main ek baar ek baar are sir main GST ka bhi mail kar deta hu main ki bhai GST mat pay karna.
Executive: Usse kya ho jayega sir?
Customer: Aapki account team ka bhi mujhe.
Executive: Aapne recorded aapne mujhe bata diya na sir recorded line pe bol diya main us concern ko forward kar raha hu ab ek hi cheez char tarike se bolunga to usse kya ho jayega aap call pe itna kar rahe hai discussion service use bhi kar rahe hai agar main chahte na sir service use karke abhi tak main ek do order confirm kar liye ho.
Customer: Nahi karna hai sir haa nahi hoga.
Executive: Haa ji is jagah main forward kar de raha hu jo team hai wo check karegi kyuki is jagah hamari koi galti nahi hai hamari requirements proper ja rahi hai generate bhi ho rahi hai achi khasi to team hamari aage analysis karegi wo us according phir apna kaam karegi.
Customer: Okay thik hai lekin aap aapki account aapki accounting ka hi ek mujhe mail id de dijiye na us par bhi mail kar deta hu.
Executive: Wo internal hota hai wo nahi de sakte.
Customer: Haa thik hai to aapke ye wo concern raise kar dunga usko usse main mang lunga.
Executive: Is mahine ke.
Executive: Sir?
Customer: Wo jo customer care walo se usko usko main puch ke bhi ek baar mang sakta hu na wo bhi ek baar kar lunga main.
Executive: Wo bhi hamare hi paas aayega hum internal nahi dete na hi denge.
Customer: Haa.
Executive: Internal employee kisi ka nahi de sakte aap customer care se kiye na aapka point of contact customer care hai koi staff ya employee nahi hai aap India Mart ki service le rahe ho meri personal service nahi le rahe ho sir main jo yaha request forward kar raha hu aap agar mail bhi karoge na to kisi ka.
Customer: Customer customer care mein bhi bhi ek baar bol dunga aap main main GST aapka service use nahi karna chahta ab main ab GST government ko mat pay kijiyega kyuki main service use nahi karna chahta aapka.
Executive: Aap kar dijiye usse koi fayda nahi hoga aap kar dijiye sir.
Customer: Haa.
Executive: Bol raha hu to aap hi bol rahe ho aapko service use karne ke liye time nahi hai ye aap busy ho lekin mail karne ke liye bina matlab logic ka main bhi bata raha hu aapko bhi mat kijiye wo main yaha mention kar de raha hu aapko karna hai kijiye mujhe koi dikkat nahi hai lekin aap isse yahi proof kar rahe hai ki time hai aapke paas bas icha nahi hai ki chalao mushkil se 10 din hue hai sir service chalu hue is jagah hamari koi galti nahi hai.
Customer: Haa to meri icha nahi hai meri icha nahi hai haa sir meri icha nahi hai sir phir bhi phir bhi aap ye to nahi sakte ho na aise.
Executive: Kya sir?
Customer: Jit jitne din ka rupya ho utna kat lijiye maine maine bhi ye mention kiya ki aapki policy ke hisab se mujhe refund dijiye aisa nahi bol raha hu ki aap mujhe.
Executive: Waise agar bolu agar aise main bolu to refund ki policy hi nahi hai.
Executive: To phir bhi main bola ki aapka request dal de raha hu wo company use check karegi us according initiate kar diya jayega sir aap sun hi nahi rahe ho aap to ab to sirf apna sunane mein lage ho aapko bas yahi hai ki aapko baat kisi tarah se kuch bole ja rahe ho bas hamari baat bhi to sun lijiye sir jab bol raha hu kara de raha hu request dal de raha hu.
Customer: Are sir ye baat main ro ke bata raha hu sir aapko ye baat main ro ke bata raha hu.
Executive: Main samajh gaya Rathyut ji main samajh gaya sir lekin aap.
Customer: Ro ke bata raha hu sir ye ro ke bata raha hu sir.
Executive: Sir aap has ke bataiye ro ke bataiye wo sahi hai sir matlab to ek hi hai na.
Customer: Sir notification nahi aa raha hai notification wo pehle din se uska problem aa raha hai notification inquiry aa rahi hai.
Executive: Aapki galti hai aapke mobile phone ki galti hai aapko maine us din bhi bataya tha phone setting pe ja ke.
Customer: Ab maine sab check karke dekh liya bhai mere do dosto ko bhi maine connect karke dekha ki aap mein notification aata hai to usme bhi notification nahi nahi aata usme aap India Mart ki app par aap baithe rahe ho aur inquiry aata hai to aap click kar paoge upar se notification nahi aa jati bhai.
Executive: Phone mein to aap agar chahe ye to wahi hai na ab aaj aap sahi point bol rahe hai yaha pe.
Customer: Aapki aapki app khol ke baithe rahe aur aap inquiry aata hai to hum click kar sakte hai wo right hai aapki point.
Executive: Sir aapne aapne jab company start ki thi na.
Customer: Haa.
Executive: Aap hi ne bataya tha teen mahine field mein ghume the tab pehla customer mila tha pehle din koi customer nahi mil gaya tha yaad kijiye sir.
Customer: Par notification nahi aa raha hai na sir sabse badi dikkat yahi hai band karwane ki notification.
Executive: Uske liye aap phone check karenge na sir humse discuss karenge na ya direct refund ke liye dal denge.
Customer: Direct refund ke liye dal dijiye abhi waise hi rahega.
Executive: Hamara koi nuksan nahi hai nuksan aapka hai aap itni sari customer ko sun rahe hai.
Customer: Mujhe utha ke dijiye sir nuksan.
Executive: Koi dikkat nahi hai yaha agar mujhe dikh raha hai ki main mahine ki hazar leads aapko de sakta hu utni leads mere paas generate ho rahi hai yaha to aapki icha nahi hai yaha company ki koi galti nahi hai sir aisa nahi hai ki main leads nahi de pa raha hu yaha mere paas leads achi khasi hai export consultancy ki baat karu to 300 leads GST ki 128 FSSAI ki 86 har mahine ja rahi hai sir aap agar pura month use karte hai na aap agar pura mahine use karte do mahine use karte to aapko pata chalta ki importance kya hai.
Customer: Haa mere jaise ki customer aapke sath kitne jude hai sir usme wo unka unka details bhi dijiye na.
Executive: 500.
Customer: Kya sir?
Customer: 500 mere jaise bhi aapke sath 500 jude hue hai na.
Executive: 500 nahi hai 10000 se jyada hai.
Customer: Haa to to phir.
Customer: Isliye hum kya nahi kar pa rahe sir wo sir main akela banda hu ye nahi kar payunga main sir isliye bata raha hu main.
Executive: Sir to ye aapki galti hai.
Customer: Haa meri galti hai sir.
Executive: Wahi bata raha hu na aapko pehle bhi bataya hoga India Mart kaise use karte hai aapki service chalu hui hai 19 tarikh ko uske baad phir aapne 24 tarikh ko hi bol diya paanch din mein ki band kar do paanch din mein kaun si dukan band hoti hai sir aap mujhe bataiye na.
Customer: Sir lekin abhi karni hai sir jitna ghata ho ghata se karni hai.
Executive: Thik hai ab aap ek baat bataiye jab main subah se raat ko kitni baar bolna abhi call pe hi do teen baar bola main request dal de raha hu team aapko connect kar legi saat se 10 din mein ho jayega correct sir.
Customer: Haa.
Executive: Bola na to dalne dijiye sir aapko update aa jayega aapko bata diya jayega.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay koi doubt hai to boliye bina matlab ka discussion to kuch nahi hoga sir main aapko service ke liye bola ki service sahi hai leads ja rahi hai to wo cheez aapko nahi sunni aapki hai ki manpower ki kami hai thik hai main concern forward kar de raha hu.
Customer: Haa.
Executive: Aap aap refund pe hi atke hai na aapko refund hi chahiye thik hai main forward kar de raha hu baat khatam aapko update mil jayega aage se sir main khud dila dunga main khud aapko connect karwa dunga Abhishek se jab bhi koi update milegi.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Koi doubt hai yaha to sir bataiye agar aapko lag raha hai main aapki nahi sun raha.
Customer: Kitna samay mein refund mein gin sakta hu sir.
Executive: Saat se 10 din saat se 10 din.
Customer: Okay aur thik hai okay.
Executive: Yaha concern raise ho chuka hai main aapka uske liye bhi specifically mention kar de raha hu aur abhi jo aapne ye mail kiya tha na aapko refund chahiye thik hai main uska acknowledge kar raha hu aur ye concern abhi close kar de raha hu sir.
Customer: Mail wala.
Executive: Jo aapne mail kiya hai wo main close kar raha hu aur refund ka open kar raha hu chalega.
Customer: Haa kar dijiye.
Executive: Ji main aapko refund ka hi dala tha na mail mein aur kuch to nahi dala tha na sir.
Executive: Wo cheez main samajh gaya main acknowledge kar liya sir use main acknowledge karke abhi close kar de raha hu ticket ko jo aapne abhi raise kiya thik hai main samajh gaya wo cheez aapko refund chahiye aur main aage use apni team ko forward kar de raha hu ki wo refund pe kaam karke cheeze analyze kare aur phir aapko us according refund process kar de ya jo discussion hogi uske regarding aapko call aa jayegi.
Customer: Okay sir okay okay.
Executive: Abhi main ye ticket close kar du aapka.
Customer: Haa haa.
Executive: Thik hai main kar de raha hu aapke paas ek feedback aa jayega usme please satisfied de dijiyega sir.
Customer: Mail pe.
Executive: Sir sir refund ka ticket on hua ki nahi hua mujhe kaise pata chalega sir uske liye Abhishek hai main hu Abhishek hai aapko call bhi aa jayegi aur mail pe bhi initiation ka ya processing ka mail aa jayega sir saat 10 din ke andar.
Customer: Okay thik hai sir.
Executive: Haa.
Executive: Aapko ab jo bhi jawab hoga India Mart samne se degi aap panic mat kijiye please.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Okay thik hai haa thik hai okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to cancel the subscription.

- Customer wants a refund with GST amount.

- Customer is not receiving notifications in the app.



Resolution:

- Executive initiated the cancellation request.

- Executive assured GST amount will be refunded.

- Executive mentioned the refund process takes 7-10 days.

- Executive will forward the concern to the team.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will receive a call in 7-10 days.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, gst, cancellation, notification
